message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the market value.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $14,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go lower than $16,000.  This price still offers you a good deal and allows me to make a reasonable profit.  Let's see if we can find a compromise here.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $15,500. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
